title: Seeing someone you love sick in a dream

preview.html: Seeing someone you love sick in a dream: Ibn Sirin sees in a dream someone he loves who is sick, and it is one of the praiseworthy visions. This dream is also interpreted as comfort for the dreamer who will soon succeed, and all the crises he has suffered will be alleviated. This dream also explains that the dreamer will receive A lot of money, with good news coming soon. And when a lady sees in her dream that her son is sick, it means that she and her husband will get a lot of sustenance. Ibn Sirin also believes that anyone who sees someone he loves sick with a serious illness, such as measles. This indicates Good news soon. But if you see the father or mother sick, this is evidence of a dispute between the dreamer and his parents, and he must treat them with kindness and honor them. Also, seeing someone you love sick in a dream means that this person may try to hide some things from the dreamer and is afraid to tell him about them. This dream may indicate the extent of the dreamer’s attachment to his beloved and his intense love for her. When the dreamer sees someone in the hospital, this dream is a sign for the dreamer that the difficult period he is going through has ended. And that his life will enjoy the peace and stability that he has always desired, and God knows best. And when the dreamer sees A sick person, but he was cured in the dream, this is a sign that this person will soon get rid of his worries. Interpretations of seeing someone you love sick in a dream. In the case of seeing a person suffering from an illness that causes stagnation in the dream. It is evidence of abundant goodness and success that the dreamer will achieve. As for when The dreamer sees in his dream a person he loves, but he is sick with cancer. It indicates that this person has many bad qualities. Perhaps this person is trying to lead the dreamer down a bad path. Some interpreters believe that the extent of a person’s illness in a dream is the extent of the patient’s love and appreciation for the dreamer. Where a pregnant woman dreams of being sick. It is evidence that this person has a lot of feelings and appreciation for the dreamer. And when the dreamer sees that he is visiting a sick person he loves, this is a sign that he will achieve the goals and objectives that he wished for from God. This dream also indicates that if the dreamer is a student, He will excel in his studies. If the dream is at the time of exams, this indicates to the dreamer that he will pass these exams with flying colors. He should not feel fear and anxiety. And do not forget to read our article about: Interpretation of seeing a sick person in a dream for a single woman. Seeing someone you love sick in a dream for single peopleWhen a woman dreams If she is single with a sick person whom she loves, this is a sign that there are some disturbances in her life that must be overcome. If a sick person cries in a dream, this is a sign that this person has debts and should be advised to try to get rid of debts. Seeing a sick person she knows in a dream is a sign of caution. Caution because there is someone who wants to marry her, but he is not suitable for her. And when she sees that the sick person in her sleep is laughing and his face is filled with happiness. It is a sign for her that she will marry a man with good qualities and live happily. Seeing a sick person she loves in a married woman’s dreamWhen a woman sees In her dream that her husband is sick, this vision indicates...

title: Interpretation of seeing a fight in a dream and the symbol of a fight in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a fight in a dream indicates evil and disputes, and it is said that fights in a dream are not good because they symbolize hostility and hatred. In this article you read Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a fight in a dream, the meaning of a quarrel in a dream, seeing a quarrel with relatives in a dream, and the interpretation of seeing people quarreling In a dream, they quarrel with her. A stranger in a dream and dreaming of a quarrel with a woman, and other symbols of strife and strife in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a fight in a dream by Ibn Sirin and al-Nabulsi Ibn Sirin said: Fighting in a dream is evidence of demanding rights and rights. Whoever sees that he is arguing with someone in a dream unfairly will be very sad. Fighting and screaming in a dream indicates a violation of a covenant and covenant. Sheikh Al-Nabulsi said that fighting in a dream is a sign of anxiety and sadness for the pioneer. Perhaps seeing a fight with someone in a dream shows the dreamer’s weakness and vulnerability, and seeing fights and quarrels in a dream means asking for money that is not the dreamer’s right. From others on him. Ibn Shaheen said: Arguing in a dream symbolizes diligence in seeking livelihood, and perhaps seeing a quarrel in a dream indicates seeking a benefit from it, and it was said: Whoever sees himself righteous in an argument in a dream. He will not achieve anything from his request or intention, and whoever sees that he is arguing with a person about God’s help in a dream, then God will help him against his enemies, because God Almighty says: “And God will help him whom he helps.” . “It is said that arguing with someone in a dream is a sign of excessive exhaustion. Whoever afflicts the dreamer and quarreling with the king in the dream is evidence of the dreamer’s bad luck. Perhaps seeing a quarrel with the Sultan in his palace in a dream indicates that the dreamer will be imprisoned or his neck will be cut. Seeing a quarrel with your family in a dream means The dreamer’s affairs will be difficult, and perhaps seeing a quarrel with an unknown person in a dream means that the dreamer will fall into distress and distress, while seeing a quarrel with people in the dream indicates dealing with enemies. It has been said that quarrels with children in the dream are evidence that the viewer is subject to a dispute, and perhaps Seeing a child quarreling and one of them dying in a dream indicates problems and hardships that the viewer is suffering from. Arguing with women in a dream does not deserve praise, because it indicates scandal to the fortuneteller, especially arguing loudly. Arguing with women and hitting them in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is taking advantage of the woman. But it doesn't last. And God Almighty is the All-Knowing. A symbol of a quarrel with relatives in a dream. A quarrel with relatives in a dream appears as enemies who show friendship and conspire evil. Perhaps seeing a quarrel with relatives in a dream indicates that the fortuneteller will collect money stolen from him. Seeing a dispute with relatives in the house in a dream indicates a dispute over inheritance. Seeing a dispute with relatives in front of strangers in a dream may indicate shame and disgust that will affect the dreamer. Seeing a dispute with relatives in front of parents in a dream shows disobedience to parents. Quarrel with relatives using offensive words in a dream is evidence of the fortuneteller denying what others know. Perhaps seeing a quarrel with relatives through gossip. Insults in a dream indicate that the fortuneteller reveals his family’s secrets.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a weight scale in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about measuring weight by Imam Al-SadiqInterpretation of seeing measuring weight in a dream is one of the visions that indicate the dreamer’s transition to a new life and taking an important step in his life. Also, seeing measuring weight in a dream indicates that some changes will happen to the dreamer in the coming period. Seeing measuring weight in a dream is A sign of the dreamer's self-confidence and interest in many things in his life. Imam Al-Sadiq interpreted that seeing weight gain in a dream while the dreamer is thin in reality means kindness and nourishment. It is known about gaining weight in a dream that it is one of the dreams that indicates that the dreamer will obtain large sums of money. Interpretation Measuring weight in a dream for a single woman. The interpretation of a dream about a single woman measuring her weight in a dream is one of the visions that indicate the occurrence of some important events in her life. Seeing measuring weight in a dream for a single woman means that she will move to a new life that will be better than the one she was experiencing. It is considered Seeing weight gain in a dream is one of the dreams that indicate girls’ success, success, and obtaining appropriate opportunities. Seeing weight loss in a dream shows a single woman the problems and difficulties that she may go through, and it is a sign of separation from a member of your family. Interpretation of weight gain in a dream for a married woman: Seeing Weight gain in a married woman’s dream is evidence of her transition to a better life and an end to the problems she was facing with her husband. The interpretation of seeing weight gain in a dream for a woman is one of the desired visions and indicates kindness and great nourishment that she will receive. Seeing measuring weight in a dream for a woman is considered... For a married woman, one of the dreams that has many meanings is that she will become pregnant soon. Interpretation of seeing weight in a dream for a pregnant woman. Interpretation of a dream about measuring weight in a dream for a pregnant woman is evidence that she will go through an easy and accessible birth without problems. Seeing measuring weight in a dream for a pregnant woman means that God It will provide her with comfort and security and she will get what she wants. Seeing weight gain in a dream also indicates benefits, good things and many blessings in one’s life, and is a sign of ending one’s problems. Seeing someone who has become thin in a dreamThe interpretation of seeing someone you know in a dream has changed his appearance and become Being thin is a sign of the fears and sorrows that the dreamer is going through. Seeing the dreamer himself losing weight in the dream is evidence that he is facing some psychological and health problems during this period. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment below and a team of experts will respond to you in As soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of a dream about my husband marrying my sister in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of my husband marrying my sister. It is always said that the sister is the friend and supporter in life and it is her role to support her sister and stand by her in crises. So what about the interpretation of the dream of my husband marrying my sister? It is not natural and unknown in reality, and the visionary may not particularly accept it, so it is interested in searching for the meanings of this vision and are its meanings good or bad? Therefore, in this article, we will refer to the most important hundreds of interpretations of my husband’s dream of marrying my sister with the leading jurists and commentators, most notably Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the dream of my husband marrying my sister Many of us are associated with the interpretation of a vision or dream in a dream, especially a woman’s. If she saw in her dream that her husband had married her sister, she would undoubtedly be interested in knowing the meaning of this vision. A legal presentation of the most important interpretations of a dream about my husband marrying my sister: Some scholars believe that a married woman’s vision of her husband marrying her sister is evidence of a business partnership between them. Many wives believe that the dream of her husband marrying her sister is a sure sign of infidelity, but it is the opposite in the interpretation of jurists, as it may indicate shortcomings. The wife has the right to her home, and her neglect of the husband’s affairs, and this vision is just a dream. If the dreamer sees that her husband is marrying her sister, he also provides her with financial and moral assistance. Interpretation of the dream of my husband marrying my sister by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin said in the interpretation of the dream of my husband marrying my sister the following Ibn Sirin says: If a married woman sees that he is her husband and her sister and her mate marry, this may indicate the existence of a common heritage between them, resulting in many disputes. While the dreamer sees her husband marrying her sister in a dream and having a boy by her, this indicates his promotion at work and assuming a position. Important. The interpretation of a dream about a husband marrying the dreamer’s unmarried sister symbolizes her already close marriage to a good man. Interpretation of a dream about my husband marrying my married sister. Among the signs that bode well for a married woman who sees her husband marrying her sister are the following cases: It is said that the interpretation of a dream about my husband marrying my married sister But she was not angry. It shows the husband’s appreciation and respect for her sister. If the wife sees that her husband is marrying her sister in a dream, she may sympathize with her or always provide assistance in times of need. Interpretation of a dream about my husband marrying my pregnant sister. It is not required that seeing the husband marry his wife’s sister in a pregnant woman’s dream means Betrayal and suspicion. It may indicate other indicators, such as: Interpretation of a dream about my husband marrying my sister to a pregnant woman indicates a lot of goodness. Scientists advise a pregnant woman who sees in her dream that her husband is marrying her sister not to care and take the vision seriously and not to get angry and destroy her home. If a pregnant woman sees That her husband is marrying her sister, this may indicate a good friendship between them. Jurists say that a pregnant woman who saw her husband marrying her sister in a dream and cried is just a dream that reflects her fears for the fetus and childbirth and her inner turmoil due to pregnancy complications. If the pregnant woman sees that he is her husband, then she has married her sister, She is already married, and she is also pregnant, so this indicates an easy birth and a healthy birth. It is said that seeing a pregnant woman marrying her sister who was very pregnant

If a pregnant woman sees that her husband is marrying her sister, and she is already married, and she is also pregnant, this indicates an easy birth and a healthy birth. title: Seeing a blessing in a dream for a married, single, or pregnant woman

preview.html: There have been many opinions and interpretations that spoke about the interpretation of seeing a blessing in a dream. Some of them said that it is a sign of livelihood and an abundance of good deeds, and some of them said that it is a sign of distance from religion and falling into it. Worries and sorrows. But before interpreting the vision, it is necessary to pay attention to the social status of the visionary and then the circumstances of the vision in order to obtain a specific and correct interpretation. Here in this article we will discuss with you in detail the interpretation of seeing a lake in a dream, the interpretation of a dream of a lake with cloudy water, a lake of water in a dream For a single woman, a blessing in a dream for a married woman, and an interpretation of a dream about a pool of water for a pregnant woman. Blessing in dreams. Most of the opinions of dream interpretation scholars agree that seeing a blessing in a dream is a thankful and promising vision for the viewer. Seeing a blessing in a dream symbolizes that the dreamer will gain a lot of livelihood, money, and profits. During this period. Seeing yourself drinking from a lake in a dream can be a symbol of the dreamer’s long life and can be a symbol of the good relationship that unites the dreamer and his family. Interpretation of a dream about a freshwater lake may symbolize the viewer’s distance from the teachings of his religion and his isolation from its principles. Interpretation of a dream about a lake if It contained warm water. It may symbolize that the dreamer’s life is full of sadness, pain, and problems. If you see yourself drowning in a lake in a dream, this may symbolize the weakness of the dreamer’s character. It may symbolize the viewer being subjected to injustice or coercion by a person with authority and rule. The vision A blessing in a dream can symbolize a good heart, good morals, and the purity and purity of intentions. A blessing in a dream for an unmarried woman can be a sign of a close connection or marriage, and this is according to the same vision. Seeing salvation from drowning in a lake is a promising vision that symbolizes the justice of the situation. And religion and closeness to God. Interpretation of a dream about a lake in the house: In a dream, its interpretation is not good, especially in the case of a sinking house. Interpretation of a dream about a pond in a married woman’s dream, an indication of the ease of her affairs, the justice of her circumstances, and a small blessing that is an expense. Interpretation of a dream about a pond for a pregnant woman is an indication of ease Childbirth and the health, safety and security of the newborn. See also: Drowning in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a lake with cloudy water. Interpretation of a dream about a lake with turbid water symbolizes the dreamer obtaining forbidden money or obtaining forbidden profits or from a corrupt source. It is possible that the interpretation of a dream about a lake with cloudy water is a symbol of the dreamer’s failure and failure to His ability to achieve what he aspires to. In the dream of a seeker of knowledge, the interpretation of a dream about a lake with cloudy water symbolizes his failure in his studies and his failure to achieve the desired success. There is an opinion that says that the interpretation of a dream about a lake with cloudy water is a symbol of the dreamer’s serious illness. A pond of water in a dream for a single woman. Seeing A pool of water in a dream for an unmarried woman symbolizes the enjoyment of good morals, a good heart, chastity, and purity of intentions. Perhaps a pool of water in a dream for an unmarried woman symbolizes people’s love for her, whether they are relatives or strangers to her, as long as the blessing is pure. There is an opinion that says that seeing A pool of water in a dream for an unmarried woman

title: The meaning of seeing a crown in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of seeing a crown in a dream Today we will show you a topic that mentions a category of all interpretations related to seeing a crown in a dream, such as seeing a golden crown and a silver crown or wearing it in an unmarried girl’s dream or in a married woman’s dream and in a man’s dream. You may also be interested in the following: Bathing in Dream Meaning of seeing a crown in a dream Meaning of seeing a crown in a dream His Eminence Sheikh Muhammad bin Shirin explained that seeing a crown in a woman’s dream indicates that God will grant her a good man, respect, influence, and power. Seeing a pregnant woman indicates that a crown is on her head in a dream, which indicates that God will bless her with a child. Male, but if it is on the head of men, this is a sign of influence, knowledge, authority and power. Seeing a golden crown in a dream symbolizes a serious warning against generosity and worries, but for women it is good news and good news. Seeing a crown in a sick person’s dream indicates the presence of an urgent embassy with permission. God. If a man sees a crown in a dream, this indicates a close marriage to a fair girl of beauty and morals. As for a prisoner, this is evidence of comfort and freedom. The crown symbolizes the return of an absent or traveler. Seeing a jeweled crown is better than seeing a golden crown. It may be Interested in: Pregnancy in a dreamSeeing a crown in an unmarried girl’s dreamSeeing an unmarried girl or an unmarried girl in her dream means that a young man will propose to her, and this is if the unmarried woman sees herself wearing a crown on her head, but if the crown is stolen or taken away in the dream for a girl Unmarried, this indicates separation and abandonment by some close people. Seeing a golden crown symbolizes a man of character and generosity. A man with high work experience, and if you see a crown with many jewels, precious stones and diamonds, this indicates a man with good qualities. You may also be interested in: Penguin in a dream Seeing a crown in a married woman’s dream Ibn Sirin said that seeing a crown in a married woman’s dream is evidence However, her father, husband, or eldest son. As for the golden crown in a married woman’s dream, it symbolizes God granting her a male child. Whereas the silver crown refers to females only, and the crown in which there are diamonds and precious stones indicates that God will provide you with goodness and abundance. But if an educated person sees that the crown has been stolen or lost, this warns of alienation and almost ruin, and if you see a crown under the ground, this indicates an abundance of money. A broken crown portends illness and severe pain, and as for removing the crown, this portends an imminent divorce, and God knows best. If you see Yourself wearing a crown in a dream indicates lasting happiness and the love that fills your life, and God knows best. If the crown was golden, it meant it would be a boy. As for seeing a crown made of jewels, this indicates that childbirth will be easy, and God knows best. The crown

title: Interpretation of seeing a stewardess in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a flight attendant in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Kathir, and Imam Al-Sadiq. Scientists and jurists interpreted dreams and visions through the vision website roy2a.com. We will talk about the interpretation of this vision for a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a man, a young man, or a divorced woman. What is the interpretation of seeing a flight attendant in a dream for a single girl? A single girl sees a flight attendant in a dream, and flying from one house to another is a sign of her marriage to a good young man from that house. Seeing a single girl flying in Air Not knowing the right path is a sign of her difficulties and fears. Seeing yourself flying with wings in a dream is an indication that there is someone in her life who loves her and helps her succeed and reach her goal. Seeing a single girl who cannot fly in a dream is a sign of losing self-confidence and feeling lonely. See also: Interpretation of your vision Flying in a dream What is the interpretation of a married woman seeing a flight attendant in a dream? Seeing a married woman seeing a flight attendant in a dream is a sign to change her life for the better and bring her goodness and happiness. Seeing a married woman flying with wings in a dream is a sign that she is helping her husband to shine, achieve his dreams, and stand by her. Seeing a married woman Flying in a dream is a sign of God satisfying her desire and feeding her with a happy pregnancy. Seeing yourself flying in the sky in a dream is a sign of Hajj and Umrah rituals in the near future. Seeing yourself falling to the ground while flying is a sign of a tragic accident and serious illness with a speedy recovery from it. See also: Interpretation of seeing someone flying in What is the interpretation of a pregnant woman seeing a flight attendant in her dream? A pregnant woman seeing a flight attendant in a dream shows her feeling of happiness and love for the arrival of her new child. A pregnant woman seeing a flight attendant in a dream is a sign of prestige, honor, and her care for a son who is fair and good with her. What is the interpretation of seeing a young man flying in a dream? Seeing a young man flying in a dream, moving between countries, is evidence of his marriage to more than one woman and his intense love for her. Seeing a young man flying with a group of birds indicates the formation of many social relationships. Watching the journey from house to house indicates the approaching of his happy marriage to a very beautiful girl, and his love. Seeing flights without fatigue or hardship is a sign of success in his life, and flying without returning indicates his imminent death. See also: Interpretation of seeing a bat in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing Ibn Sirin flying in a dream? Seeing Ibn Sirin flying in a dream without wings is a sign of change. His condition is for the better without making any effort. Seeing him wearing wings and wings to fly is a sign that he has gone through many difficulties in traveling and achieving his goals. What is Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of seeing a flight attendant in a dream? Seeing a flight attendant in a dream in Nabulsi has many connotations and interpretations that vary depending on her job and her security for the arrival of travelers to their country. Seeing a flight attendant in a dream is a good vision that indicates great ambition and success in overcoming crises and solving problems. Seeing a flight attendant appearing in elegant clothes is a banner that covers the dreamer in the world and a feeling of security and peace. Weak visions

title: Interpretation of a dream about the death of a father and crying over him

preview.html: Because the father represents protection and security, and commentators agreed that the interpretation of the vision varies depending on the dreamer’s condition in the dream and what he saw. For this reason, we will quote from Mufsir Akbar’s dream interpretation website. What does this dream mean for single women, married women, pregnant women, divorced women, and men? Interpretation of seeing a father’s death and crying over him in a dream for an unmarried girl: Seeing a single girl whose father dies in a dream expresses what this girl needs from the tenderness of a father. Sometimes you can see her talking to him while she is crying and then she dies. This is good news that he will get what he hopes for. Seeing her deceased father talking to her in a dream while she is crying hard, is abundant good news. This dream may mean the end of her father’s guardianship over her and her transition to her husband. If an unmarried woman sees her father dying, this means that The father will have a new status. It is also a sign of happy news. At other times, this vision may represent changes in her life for the better or her marriage is approaching. When she sees that he dies while working, this portends a lot of good. See also: Seeing a dead father in a dream for a son Sirin Interpretation of the death of a father and crying in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees her father dying in a dream and she is crying, this represents the sorrows that the girl goes through in her life. Seeing that she is talking to him and then dying, this indicates her need for tenderness, love, and care. At other times, she is watching her father die And he is crying silently. This is good news that God will give her incomparable joy after the great tribulation. A woman may see her father dying in a dream, this is good news for the provision and blessings of children. Sometimes, the death of a father indicates that he raised her with good upbringing. Seeing a father dying in The dream represents longevity. If a woman sees her father dying in her dream, this indicates the difficulties she is going through. But if he helps her, it is fortunate that these difficulties will be overcome. If she sees that her father is dying and joy appears on his face. This is a sign of circumstances and joys. Which women will enjoy in the near future. The death of the father in a married woman’s dream means that she will overcome her sorrows and stabilize her family. Interpretation of seeing the death of the father and crying over him in a dream for the divorced woman. If the divorced woman sees that she is crying in a dream as a result of the death of her father, this is a sign of the sadness and sorrow that she is experiencing. If A divorced woman sees that she is crying in a dream about the death of her father, so this is a sign that all the difficulties she is going through will go away. Also, seeing her deceased father and crying over him is a good thing that she will marry again and live a happy life. Seeing the death of a divorced woman’s father in a dream indicates her long life. Seeing the death of a father and crying over him in a dream may represent the relief that a woman will get. If she sees her father dying and she is trying to save him, this means a long life for him, and God knows best. Read also: Interpretation of seeing a father in a dream and its meaningInterpretation of seeing a father’s death and crying over him in a man’s dream and its meaningIf a man sees His father was dying in a dream and he felt that there was a conflict between them. This is a sign that he will discover something that he did not know before

title: What is the interpretation of the number 6 in a dream?

preview.html: Interpretation of Vision No. 6 by Ibn SirinInterpretation of Vision No. 6 in a dream shows the end and is also evidence of matters related to marriage. The number 6 in the dream is to end troubles and troubles and eliminate worries. Seeing the number 6 in a dream indicates the success of all the projects that the dreamer has planned. Interpretation of Dream No. 6 about Nabulsi Al-Nabulsi confirmed Seeing the number 6 in a dream is evidence of marriage in the near future and it will be successful, God willing. The number 6 in a dream indicates rejection of problems and the end of problems. Seeing the number 6 in a dream is goodness, happiness, and abundance of sustenance. Dream number 6 shows happy news and the end of problems and troubles. Seeing the dream Number 6 for single people: Seeing the girl number 6 in a dream and seeing her often indicates patience, comfort, and relief from anxiety. Seeing the number 6 in an unmarried girl’s dream is evidence of the good deeds that that girl is doing and the beginning of a new stage in her life that may be marriage in the near future. The number 6 in a dream indicates patience and peace of mind. Interpretation of a dream of number 6 for a married woman. Number 6 in a dream is an indication that you are traveling for money. Dream number 6 in a married woman’s dream indicates the end of marital problems and arguments between her and her parents. The number 6 indicates success In business and trade. Interpretation of a dream of 6 for a pregnant woman: Seeing the number 6 in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the end of pregnancy problems and easy childbirth. The number 6 in a pregnant woman’s dream is often an indication of the birth of twins and she will enjoy good offspring. Interpretation scholars also indicated that the number zero is an indication of A pregnant woman’s due date is approaching. Seeing a dream number 6 for a man. The number 6 indicates a man’s dream about the end of problems and recovery from diseases. He dreams of a wind number. 6 and 7 in a dream indicate the achievement of goals and aspirations that a man has been seeking for a long time.• The number 6 in a dream indicates that some work will be completed within 6 months.• Seeing the number 6 in a dream means success, excellence, and achieving goals. Add the dream you would like Explain it by referring to the marital status in a comment below the article, and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Learn about Ibn Shirin’s interpretation of seeing a house burning in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a burning house in a dream? When they dream of a burning house in a dream, many see that it portends only evil and that it is an annoying dream, and many begin to ask questions about the interpretation of a house fire in a dream. Fire in a dream indicates many signs, including good and evil, and that is why we wanted to present to you today the interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s vision of a house fire for everyone who is interested, follow me. Interpretation of a dream about a house on fire in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin explained seeing fire with different meanings, and among these meanings are: seeing A burning fire in the house symbolizes hell. As for torment, fire was mentioned in the Qur’an and that the jinn were created from fire. Seeing fire in a dream indicates jinn and devils - God forbid. Seeing fire in a dream is good news and a warning to the dreamer, and torment, loss, imprisonment, and sins to which the dreamer will be exposed. If he sees in a dream that he is burning the house with a fire that contains sparks, flames, and sound, then this indicates turmoil that will happen to him in his life until he burns, and God Almighty knows best. Dreaming of fire in the house. Ibn Sirin showed that the dream With a house fire indicates an internal or external change for the dreamer. If the fire breaks out in the dream and the winds of fire enter the house again, this means that you see thieves who can enter the house and steal the house. When you see someone lighting a fire for people and lighting the way, this is a sign of knowing that the dreamer will spread among His people and his family. A house fire in a dream indicates a disaster in the same place. Your dream will be interpreted in seconds on the Egyptian Dream Interpretation website by Google. I dreamed of a fire in our house. Seeing the house burning is a sign of the dreamer’s good news of wealth and glory. If in a dream he sees a burning fire burning the house There is no smoke, so this means that the dreamer will perform Hajj in the same year, and God knows best. If you see in a dream that the house is burning, this is a warning to the dreamer of the dangerous things in his life and he must abandon these dangerous matters. Interpretation of a dream about a fire in the house for a man when a man sees himself lighting a fire In his home, it shows his intense and wonderful love for science and culture. If he sees that the house is burning for warmth, this symbolizes profit and abundant profit that the dreamer will obtain. Sources:- 1- Book of Kalam in the Interpretation of Dreams, Muhammad Ibn Sirin, Dar al-Ma’rifah, Beirut, 2000.2- Dictionary of Interpretation of Dreams, Ibn Sirin and Sheikh Abdul Ghani Al-Nabulsi, research by Basil Breidi, Al-Safa Library, Abu Dhabi 2008.
